name: astro-resume-theme
title: Astro Resume Theme
desc: Astro Resume Theme is a customizable and responsive template designed to help you create a beautiful online resume or portfolio quickly. Built with Astro and styled using Tailwind CSS.
article:
Astro Resume Theme

Astro Resume Theme is a customizable and responsive template designed to help you create a beautiful online resume or portfolio quickly. Built with Astro and styled using Tailwind CSS.

Features

Tailwind CSS for Styling: Easily customizable styles and utility classes.

Themeable: Modify the look and feel by adjusting values in `src/styles/theme.css`

Dark Mode: Toggle between light and dark themes for a personalized user experience.

Responsive Design: Optimized for all screen sizes, from mobile to desktop.

MDX Blog Support: Integrate blog posts seamlessly into your resume or portfolio.

Excellent Lighthouse/PageSpeed scores

SEO-friendly
